original_text: It also included the weight of pure gold to make the forks, dishes, cups and small bowls. Each gold bowl had its own weight. There was also the weight of silver for each of the silver bowls.
korean_text: 갈고리와 대접과 종지를 만들 순금과 금 잔 곧 각 잔을 만들 금의 무게와 또 은 잔 곧 각 잔을 만들 은의 무게를 정하고

sentences.original_text: It also included the weight of pure gold
to make the forks, dishes, cups and small bowls
sentences.korean_translation: 갈고랑, 접시, 잔과 작은 대접을 만들기 위해

sentences.original_text: Each gold bowl had its own weight
sentences.korean_translation: 각 금 대접은 자신의 무게를 가지고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: There was also the weight of silver
for each of the silver bowls
